title: Failure to maintain the fire installations and periodical certification may leads to withdrawal of Occupation Certificate by the Authority in addition to fine / penalty and other actions from the concern authorities
clause_text: Failure to maintain the fire installations and periodical certification may leads to withdrawal of Occupation Certificate by the Authority in addition to fine / penalty and other actions from the concern authorities.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
